row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH !Creates a snapshot using the java tool :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Archive Path" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_ARCHIVE_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source path" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Include filter" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_FILTERS# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Exclude filter" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_FILTER_EX#
:SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Archive Path" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_ARCHIVE_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source path" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Include filter" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_FILTERS# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Exclude filter" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_FILTER_EX#
errors=0 :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE@UNIX
if [ "$ISDIR" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Source directory &UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH# does not exist." : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER errors=1 fi
:IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 exit 100 :ENDIF
if [ $errors -gt 0 ] ; then exit $errors fi
!Start execution :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_ARCHIVE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_ARCHIVE_PATH# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.COMMAND_CREATOR java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#file-system-tool.jar" snapshot CreateFileSnapshot &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX

row.post_process:
:SET &checkForText# = "Snapshot-GUID:*" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_LINE_BY_TEXT :PRINT "RESULT LINE: &UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#) > 16 : PRINT "RESULT_line: &UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" : PSET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_GUID# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#,16) :ENDIF
:SET &checkForText# = "Content-File:*" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_LINE_BY_TEXT :PRINT "RESULT LINE: &UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#) > 14 : PRINT "RESULT_line: &UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" : PSET &UC4_REPORT_CONTENT# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#,14) :ENDIF
:SET &checkForText# = "Result-Status: *" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.RETRIEVE_LINE_BY_TEXT :PRINT "RESULT LINE: &UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#) > 15 : PRINT "RESULT_line: &UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#" : PSET &UC4RB_CONTENT_STATUS# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_RESULT_LINE#,15) :ENDIF
